snippet: My parenting resolutions for this 2012: clean it, own it and enjoy it.
abstract: My parenting resolutions for this 2012: clean it, own it and enjoy it.
lead_paragraph: Either you're the kind of person who makes New Year's resolutions or you're not. I most emphatically am and a few of my resolutions are very specific to me as a parent. I've made the whole idea of "the parent we want to be" versus the "parent we actually are" something of a meme for Motherlode in part because for me, there's often such a huge gap between the two.

headline.main: New Year's Resolutions to Parent By
